About the Company: Carewell Industries Limited operates in the household insecticide industry. It provides mosquito repellent coils under the brand ROOSTER; and incense sticks under the brand name of Deo and Samraj. The company markets its products through a network of dealers and distributors primarily in South India. Carewell Industries Limited was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Chennai, India.
